thread.section_title: Trekkinn.com opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Trekkinn.com | www.trekkinn.com
thread.title: Derek

author: Derek
title: Derek
text: Purchased hiking boots mid feb 2017, march 10th now and i have no idea where they are. Tracking info doesn't show anything after package leaves spain....reached out 4 times to customer service with no return communication. Originally tried to cancel order before it shipped...but there is no way to get in touch with anyone...just automated emails from "Silvia". No chat available, no option to inquire about order number xxxx. If i could rate a zero i would. Just terrible.
